title: Is Elon Musk Right About AI’s 20% Potential Threat to Humanity?
description: Elon Musk—the tech tycoon best known for SpaceX and Tesla—made a startling prediction about the direction artificial intelligence (AI) is taking during a recent speech at the Abundance Summit’s “Great AI Debate” seminar. Musk, who is well known for his observations on technology, revised his assessment of AI’s threat to humans and proposed a startling […]
